Plot vertical wind speed profile

Source: R/sounding_wind.R
sounding_wind.Rd

Function for plotting wind speed profile. TODO: Can be launched as standalone function or coupled with pre-drawn Skew-T diagram.

sounding_wind(pres, ws, ptop = 100, convert = FALSE, yaxs = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

pres

pressure levels
ws

wind speed in knots(!)
ptop

Pressure top level to be used for plotting wind speed. Valid options should be < 200 hPa (100 by default)
convert

logical. Whether to convert wind speed from knots to m/s (default FALSE)
yaxs

logic. Whether to add labels to heights on Y lab
...

extra graphic arguments

Examples

# load examplary dataset:
data("sounding_wien")
attach(sounding_wien)

#> The following objects are masked from sounding_wien (pos = 3):
#> 
#>     DRCT, DWPT, HGHT, MIXR, PRES, RELH, SKNT, TEMP, THTA, THTE, THTV
#> The following objects are masked from sounding_wien (pos = 4):
#> 
#>     DRCT, DWPT, HGHT, MIXR, PRES, RELH, SKNT, TEMP, THTA, THTE, THTV
#> The following objects are masked from sounding_wien (pos = 5):
#> 
#>     DRCT, DWPT, HGHT, MIXR, PRES, RELH, SKNT, TEMP, THTA, THTE, THTV
#> The following objects are masked from sounding_wien (pos = 6):
#> 
#>     DRCT, DWPT, HGHT, MIXR, PRES, RELH, SKNT, TEMP, THTA, THTE, THTV
#> The following objects are masked from sounding_wien (pos = 7):
#> 
#>     DRCT, DWPT, HGHT, MIXR, PRES, RELH, SKNT, TEMP, THTA, THTE, THTV
#> The following objects are masked from sounding_wien (pos = 8):
#> 
#>     DRCT, DWPT, HGHT, MIXR, PRES, RELH, SKNT, TEMP, THTA, THTE, THTV
#> The following objects are masked from sounding_wien (pos = 9):
#> 
#>     DRCT, DWPT, HGHT, MIXR, PRES, RELH, SKNT, TEMP, THTA, THTE, THTV
sounding_wind(pres = PRES, ws = SKNT, convert = TRUE, yaxs = TRUE)
